SEARCH
Package com.ttc.fitPT.ptSchedule.controller

Class SchedulerController

java.lang.Object
com.ttc.fitPT.ptSchedule.controller.SchedulerController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/api/scheduler") public class SchedulerController extends Object
SchedulerController handles requests related to scheduling appointments, managing therapists, and patient data.

  • Method Details

    • showSchedulePage

      @GetMapping("/schedule") public String showSchedulePage()
      Renders the schedule page.
      Returns:
      the name of the HTML template for the schedule page.

    • getAvailableTherapists

      @GetMapping("/available-therapists") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Therapist>> getAvailableTherapists(@RequestParam("therapyType") String therapyType, @RequestParam("date") String dateStr, @RequestParam("time") String timeStr)
      Fetches a list of available therapists based on therapy type, date, and time.
      Parameters:
      therapyType - the type of therapy required.
      dateStr - the date of the appointment (format: YYYY-MM-DD).
      timeStr - the time of the appointment (format: HH:MM).
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a list of available therapists or a bad request status.

    • addAppointment

      @PostMapping("/add-appointment") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addAppointment(@RequestBody Map<String,String> appointmentData)
      Adds a new appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentData - a map containing appointment details.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with appointment details or an error message.

    • addPatient

      @PostMapping("/add-patient") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addPatient(@RequestBody Map<String,String> patientData)
      Adds a new patient to the system.
      Parameters:
      patientData - a map containing patient details.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with a success or error message.

    • findPatientAppointments

      @GetMapping("/find-appointments") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Appointment>> findPatientAppointments(@RequestParam(value="firstName",required=false) String firstName, @RequestParam(value="lastName",required=false) String lastName, @RequestParam(value="email",required=false) String email, @RequestParam(value="phone",required=false) String phone)
      Finds appointments for a patient based on provided details.
      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name of the patient (optional).
      lastName - the last name of the patient (optional).
      email - the email of the patient (optional).
      phone - the phone number of the patient (optional).
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a list of appointments or a bad request status.

    • modifyAppointment

      @PostMapping("/modify-appointment") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> modifyAppointment(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> requestData)
      Modifies an existing appointment.
      Parameters:
      requestData - a map containing appointment and patient modification details.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with a success or error message.

    • cancelAppointment

      @DeleteMapping("/cancel-appointment") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> cancelAppointment(@RequestParam("appointmentId") int appointmentId)
      Cancels an appointment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment to cancel.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with a success or error message.

    • getAppointmentByMonth

      @GetMapping("/appointments-by-month") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Appointment>> getAppointmentByMonth(@RequestParam("year") int year, @RequestParam("month") int month)
      Retrieves appointments for a specific month and year.
      Parameters:
      year - the year of the appointments.
      month - the month of the appointments.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a list of appointments or a bad request status.

    • getConflictingAppointmentsByMonth

      @GetMapping("/conflicting-appointments-by-month") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Appointment>> getConflictingAppointmentsByMonth(@RequestParam("year") int year, @RequestParam("month") int month)
      Retrieves conflicting appointments for a specific month and year.
      Parameters:
      year - the year of the appointments.
      month - the month of the appointments.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a list of conflicting appointments or an error status.
